# Solarium BBStro

#### Written in 1994 for MS-DOS.

[Original package](https://defacto2.net/f/b028bec)

```
     An Anarchy Production

         ┐  └┐ │ ┌┘  ┌
     ─┐  └┐Assembler┌┘  ┌─
      └Sources Included!┘
   ──┐  └ ▄▄███████▄▄ ┘  ┌──
  ┐  └─ ▄████▀███▀████▄ ─┘  ┌
  └─── ▄████ ▄ █ ▄ ████▄ ───┘
 ───── ████████▀████████ ─────

        S O L A R I U M
             B B S
      ADVERTISEMENT INTRO
    (for Adlib,VGA and 386)
SPiDeR/OTL/ToXiC/TMC & EXoTiC/TRaXX/TMC
```
